name: F.R.I.E.N.D.
description:
F.R.I.E.N.D is an underwater exploration game where you catalogue fish and upgrade your F.R.I.E.N.D. (Friendly Remote Investigative Environment Navigation Device) to explore deeper and deeper into the ocean. 

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 by Jake White and Benjamin Busche.
